effect.2: Does not prevent regular KOs from full [HP]{mechanic:hp}.
effect.4: Does not absorb non-damaging []{type:electric} moves, i.e. []{move:thunder-wave}.
effect.5: Triggers on every hit of multiple-hit moves.
effect.6: []{move:will-o-wisp} does not trigger this ability for Pokémon immune to [burns]{mechanic:burn}.
effect.9: Does not take effect if acquired after entering battle.
effect.10: Affects other Pokémon with this ability.
effect.11: Inflicts only 1/16 of the attacker's maximum [HP]{mechanic:hp} in damage.
effect.12: []{move:fire-fang} and moves that inflict [typeless damage]{mechanic:typeless-damage} ignore this ability regardless of type.
effect.14: Cannot influence the natures of Pokémon encountered by interacting with them on the overworld.
effect.15: Passes back bad [poison]{mechanic:poison} as regular poison.
effect.17: Does not affect non-damaging []{type:electric} moves, i.e. []{move:thunder-wave}.  Increases the frequency of Match Call calls on the overworld if any party Pokémon has this ability.
effect.18: Redirects []{type:electric} moves without negating them or granting any [Special Attack]{mechanic:special-attack} boost.  Does not redirect []{move:hidden-power}.
effect.21: Prevents []{move:heal-bell} from curing the Pokémon, whether or not it is in battle.
effect.23: Does not affect friendly Pokémon's moves that target all other Pokémon.  This ability's presence is not announced upon entering battle.
effect.27: Doubles []{move:cut}'s grass-cutting radius on the overworld if any party Pokémon has this ability.
effect.34: Increases the frequency of cries heard on the overworld if any party Pokémon has this ability.
effect.38: [Poison]{mechanic:poison} still damages the Pokémon outside of battle.
effect.39: [Paralysis]{mechanic:paralysis} cannot prevent the Pokémon from moving, though the [Speed]{mechanic:speed} cut is unaffected.  [Poison]{mechanic:poison} still damages the Pokémon outside of battle.
effect.40: Due to a glitch, moves affected by this ability have a (100 - accuracy)% chance to hit through []{move:detect} or []{move:protect}.
effect.43: Redirects []{type:water} moves without negating them or granting any [Special Attack]{mechanic:special-attack} boost.  Does not redirect []{move:hidden-power}.
effect.46: Powers up only when paired with []{ability:minus}.
effect.47: Powers up only when paired with []{ability:plus}.
effect.50: []{move:struggle} is unaffected.  []{move:helping-hand} and []{move:defense-curl} are not taken into account.
effect.2__1: Funguje jen proti útokům, které vždy omráčí na jeden úder. (Ne proti těm, které jsou prostě příliš silné.)
